entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 9 this morning then rising.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
